faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about Flux AI and how it can enhance your creative workflow

what.question: What is Flux AI Model?
what.answer: Flux AI is a state-of-the-art artificial intelligence model designed to assist with creative tasks, image generation, and design workflows. It uses advanced machine learning algorithms to understand and generate visual content based on user input.

versions.question: What are the different versions of FLUX AI?
versions.answer: FLUX AI comes in three variants: FLUX.1 [pro] for top performance, FLUX.1 [dev] for non-commercial applications, and FLUX.1 [schnell] for fast, local development.

comparison.question: How does Flux AI compare to other AI models?
comparison.answer: Flux AI distinguishes itself through superior image quality, faster generation times, and more intuitive controls. Our model has been specifically trained on high-quality creative content, making it particularly effective for design and artistic applications.

imageTypes.question: What types of images can Flux AI generate?
imageTypes.answer: Flux AI can generate a wide range of visual content including illustrations, concept art, product designs, character designs, and environmental scenes. The model supports various artistic styles and can adapt to specific visual requirements.

requirements.question: What are the technical requirements to use Flux AI?
requirements.answer: Flux AI runs in the cloud and can be accessed through any modern web browser. No special hardware is required, though a stable internet connection is recommended for optimal performance.

fineTuning.question: Can I fine-tune the FLUX AI Image Generator on my own dataset?
fineTuning.answer: Fine-tuning options may be available for enterprise clients. Please contact Black Forest Labs directly to discuss your specific needs.

limits.question: Is there a limit to how many images I can generate?
limits.answer: Usage limits depend on your subscription tier. Free users can generate up to 3 images per day, while premium users enjoy unlimited generations and priority processing.

updates.question: How often is the FLUX AI Image Generator updated?
updates.answer: Black Forest Labs is committed to continual improvement. While specific update schedules are not provided, you can expect regular enhancements and refinements to FLUX AI.

feedback.question: How can I provide feedback or report issues with FLUX AI?
feedback.answer: Black Forest Labs welcomes feedback. You can reach out via their official channels or email flux@blackforestlabs.ai for support and to report any issues.

commercial.question: Can I use FLUX AI Image Generator for commercial projects?
commercial.answer: While FLUX.1 [schnell] is free for personal use, we offer FLUX.1 [pro] and FLUX.1 [dev] for commercial applications of Flux AI Image Generator. These versions provide enhanced capabilities and are available through our API or partners. For commercial use inquiries of FLUX AI Image Generator, please contact us at juq1991@gmail.com.

modelComparison.title: Flux AI Models Comparison
modelComparison.subtitle: Choose the perfect model for your creative needs

ultra.name: Flux 1.1 Pro Ultra
ultra.description: Images are up to 4 megapixels. Use raw mode for realism.
ultra.details: A new high-resolution capabilities to FLUX1.1 [pro], extending its functionality to support 4x higher image resolutions (up to 4MP) while maintaining an impressive generation time of only 10 seconds per sample.

schnell.name: Flux Schnell
schnell.description: The fastest image generation model tailored for local development and personal use.
schnell.details: Optimized for speed and efficiency, Flux Schnell delivers quick results perfect for initial concepts and rapid prototyping. Ideal for developers and designers who need quick iterations.

dev.name: Flux Dev
dev.description: A 12 billion parameter rectified flow transformer capable of generating images from text descriptions.
dev.details: A powerful 12B parameter image generation model delivering high-quality outputs with commercial usage support, optimized performance, and clear ethical guidelines for responsible AI development.

pro11.name: Flux 1.1 Pro
pro11.description: Faster, better FLUX Pro. Text-to-image model with excellent image quality, prompt adherence, and output diversity.
pro11.details: A state-of-the-art 12B parameter image generation model featuring 6x faster speed, enhanced quality, and benchmark-leading performance, built with advanced hybrid architecture combining multimodal and parallel diffusion transformer blocks for professional and production environments.

pro.name: Flux Pro
pro.description: State-of-the-art image generation with top of the line prompt following, visual quality, image detail and output diversity.
pro.details: A premium 12B parameter image generation model offering state-of-the-art performance with superior visual quality and versatile resolution support, powered by hybrid architecture combining multimodal and parallel diffusion transformer blocks.

imageGenerator.title: Create Stunning Images with Flux AI
imageGenerator.subtitle: Transform your ideas into visual masterpieces in seconds
imageGenerator.description: Transform your ideas into stunning visuals
imageGenerator.promptPlaceholder: Try: A majestic lion sitting on a mountain peak at sunset...

ultraHero.heroDescription: A new high-resolution capabilities to FLUX1.1 [pro], extending its functionality to support 4x higher image resolutions (up to 4MP) while maintaining an impressive generation time of only 10 seconds per sample.

faqData.question: What is Flux 1.1 Pro Ultra?
faqData.answer: Flux 1.1 Pro Ultra is an advanced AI image generator model that can create highly realistic images up to 4 megapixels in resolution. It offers both ultra and raw modes for maximum flexibility in image generation.

faqData.question: How can I try Flux 1.1 Pro Ultra?
faqData.answer: You can try Flux 1.1 Pro Ultra for free by login your account. New users get one 3 points(1 time) to experience the enhanced capabilities of this advanced model.

faqData.question: What are the key features of Flux 1.1 Pro Ultra?
faqData.answer: The key features include the ability to generate images up to 4 megapixels in size, a raw mode optimized for photorealistic outputs, and enhanced natural image generation capabilities compared to previous models.

faqData.question: What is the difference between ultra and raw modes?
faqData.answer: While both modes can generate high-quality images, the raw mode is specifically optimized for creating highly realistic and natural-looking images. Ultra mode offers more general-purpose image generation capabilities.

faqData.question: What makes Flux 1.1 Pro Ultra different from other models?
faqData.answer: Flux 1.1 Pro Ultra stands out with its ability to generate larger 4 megapixel images, enhanced realism particularly in raw mode, and improved natural image generation compared to previous versions.

resolution.title: Ultra Higher Resolution
resolution.subtitle: FLUX 1.1 Ultra Resolution Engine
resolution.description: Create stunning images up to 2096x2096 resolution with exceptional detail and clarity. Perfect for professional use and large-format printing.

speed.title: No Compromise in Speed
speed.subtitle: Faster
speed.description: Unlike many high-resolution models that experience significant slowdowns at higher resolutions, our performance benchmarks show sustained fast generation times—over 2.5x faster than comparable high-resolution offerings.

price.title: Competitive Price
price.subtitle: increase in quantity but not price
price.description: This model is competitively priced, with the same price per image as the other versions of the Pro.

rawMode.title: Raw Mode Realism
rawMode.subtitle: FLUX Ultra Generation
rawMode.description: FLUX1.1 [pro] – raw mode: For creators seeking authenticity, our new raw mode captures the genuine feel of candid photography. Toggle this feature to generate images with a less synthetic, more natural aesthetic.
